properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, AR; Cleburne, AR; Randolph, AR; Stone, AR; Izard, AR; Independence, AR; Sharp, AR; Fulton, AR; Van Buren, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 10:29PM CST until January 10 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southeastern Stone County in north central Arkansas...
Independence County in north central Arkansas...
Central Randolph County in eastern Arkansas...
Izard County in north central Arkansas...
East central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas...
Northern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas...
Fulton County in north central Arkansas...
Western Lawrence County in eastern Arkansas...
Sharp County in north central Arkansas...

* Until 1130 PM CST.

* At 1029 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Sturkie to near Oxford to Herpel to near
Fairfield Bay, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Batesville...                     Cherokee Village...
Mountain View...                  Fairfield Bay...
Melbourne...                      Salem in Fulton County...
Ash Flat...                       Black Rock...
Horseshoe Bend...                 Cave City...
Newark...                         Highland in Sharp County...
Mammoth Spring...                 Greers Ferry...
Hardy...                          Imboden...
Oxford...                         Ravenden...
Cushman...                        Mount Pleasant...
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for eastern and
north central Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread
significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately
likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of
a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant
property damage.
